meanings.definition: Anodises: to coat (a metal, especially aluminum) with a protective oxide layer by electrolysis.
meanings.sent1: She anodises the aluminum to protect it from rusting.
meanings.sent2: The factory anodises metal parts for durability.
meanings.sent3: The wizard anodises his staff to make it indestructible.
meanings.sent4: The artist anodises the metal canvas of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The scientist anodises the metal to reveal its hidden strength.

meanings.definition: Anodises: undergo a process in which a metal is coated with a protective oxide layer by electrolysis.
meanings.sent1: The metal anodises easily under the right conditions.
meanings.sent2: Aluminum anodises when exposed to certain chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The toy car anodises itself magically in the toy store.
meanings.sent4: The city anodises with a layer of hope after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The flower anodises with beauty under the morning sun.
